createTable.remarks: The StdCodesGroup entity. This table holds the definition and characteristics of the groups of standard codes used throughout e-TAX. Code groups represent lists of elements. Data in this table cannot be modified by end users.

column.name: group_code
column.remarks: Code of the group of codes

column.name: group_desc
column.remarks: Group description (name of the list of codes)

column.name: system_ind
column.remarks: System indicator. Can hold values ''Y'' or ''N''. When ''Y'', the elements of the group cannot be modified by end-users using the system configuration module. However, their description can be changed and they can be translated.

column.name: sec_level_required
column.remarks: If the elements in this group have an associated security level. Can be set to ''Y'' or ''N''. When ''Y'', all the elements of the group must have a security level in STD_CODES.SEC_LEVEL.

column.name: value_required
column.remarks: If the elements in this group have a value. Can be set to ''Y'' or ''N''. When ''Y'', all the elements of the group must have a value and their type must be specified in VALUE_TYPE.

column.name: value_type
column.remarks: Type of the value of all the elements in this group. Can be one of ''D'' (Date), ''S'' (String), ''N'' (Number) or ''B'' (Boolean). Can be set only when CODES_VALUE_REQUIRED = ''Y''.

column.name: description_required
column.remarks: Can hold values ''Y'' or ''N''. When ''N'', codes are never shown to end-users and don''t require an entry in STD_CODES_DESC. When ''Y'', EXTERNAL_CODE_REQUIRED must be set.

column.name: external_code_required
column.remarks: If the elements in this group are identified by a multilingual code shown to the user. Can hold values ''Y'' or ''N''. When set to ''Y'', the length of external codes must be specified in EXTERNAL_CODE_LENGTH. External codes are used as shortcuts in entry fields linked to drop-down lists of values.

column.name: external_code_length
column.remarks: Number of characters of the external codes. Can be set only when EXTERNAL_CODE_REQUIRED is ''Y''.

column.name: parent_group_required
column.remarks: If this group has a parent group. Can be set to ''Y'' or ''N''. When ''Y'', the parent group code must be specified in PARENT_GROUP_CODE. Used for multi-level lists of values.

column.name: parent_group_code
column.remarks: The code of the parent group. Must be set when PARENT_GROUP_REQUIRED is ''Y''.

column.name: touppercase
column.remarks: The shortcut code is shown by uppercase or not
